Online

  1. session #1

    Streamline UI Components in JS Frameworks

    @ 15:00pm

    The way be build our products have added complexity over time. There are lot of pieces we need to focus on in building an application. These pieces can act as a component which unites and builds up an entire application. In the talk we will understand what it takes to build a proper streamlined process and stay in sync with the pieces inside a team.

    1. Ishan Manandhar

      Senior UI/UX Engineer at Leapfrog Technology
